name: ReadoutDisplayMode
description: The method that the display will take when displaying text

content.name: Smart
content.description: Display the text in "Static" mode unless the text is longer than what the display can show, in which case switch to "R2LSweep"

content.name: R2LSweep
content.description: The text will scroll from right to left

content.name: L2RSweep
content.description: The text will scroll from left to right

content.name: Static
content.description: The text will be shown without movement. If the text is longer than what the display can show, the remaining characters will not be seen
